slides.script: I forgot to take my fish oil 3 days in a row last week. My brain felt so foggy, I couldn't focus at work. Sound familiar?
slides.image_prompt: A stressed woman trying to focus at a cluttered desk, looking frustrated and exhausted. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Turns out, omega-3 deficiency is a hidden epidemic. 95% of Americans don't get enough, leading to brain fog, fatigue, even mood swings. I had all the signs.

slides.script: What doctors don't tell you: most fish oil supplements use low-grade fish, so you're basically just swallowing toxins. No wonder I still felt awful while taking them!
